mapper.select: SELECT id, versionCode, del_flag AS Flag, add_time AS addTime, remark, type, client FROM mtmydb.mtmy_version ORDER BY add_time DESC
SELECT id, versionCode, del_flag AS Flag, add_time AS addTime, remark, type, client FROM mtmydb.mtmy_version WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_version( versionCode, del_flag, add_time, remark, type, client )VALUES( #{versionCode}, #{Flag}, SYSDATE(), #{remark}, #{type}, #{client} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_version SET versionCode = #{versionCode}, remark = #{remark}, type = #{type}, del_flag = #{Flag}, client = #{client} WHERE id = #{id}
